title: Space Gun
tagline: If you can't build a space gun, the least you can do is simulate it.
subtitle: Space. Gun. See how awesome that sounds?
description: As part of a class in modeling and simulation, a partner and I had a chance to model a system of our choosing. Obviously, the best choice was a space gun. After doing some math and writing some code, we made a very pretty poster which you can find in the images below. Long story short: space guns are not only awesome, but possible. (More or less.)
